description: This file contains unit tests for the Tetris game engine, including tests for RNG determinism, game initialization, piece movement, rotation, hard drop, line clearing, and hold functionality.

classes.name: GameEngineUnitTest
classes.description: A test class containing multiple unit tests for the Tetris game engine.

methods.name: sevenBag_isDeterministic
methods.description: Tests that the SevenBagRNG produces a deterministic sequence for the same seed.

methods.name: engine_initializesWithActivePiece
methods.description: Verifies that the Tetris engine initializes with an active piece and correct board state.

methods.name: movement_leftRight_noCollision
methods.description: Checks that the piece can move left or right without collision and that its position changes accordingly.

methods.name: rotation_attempt_appliesSRSOrStays
methods.description: Tests rotation behavior, ensuring it applies the Super Rotation System or stays if rotation isn't possible.

methods.name: hardDrop_locksAndSpawnsNewPiece
methods.description: Ensures that hard dropping locks the piece, spawns a new one, and updates score correctly.

methods.name: lineClear_scoresAndLevels
methods.description: Verifies that line clearing updates the score and level appropriately.

methods.name: hold_swapsPieces_andPreventsConsecutiveHold
methods.description: Tests hold functionality, making sure it swaps pieces correctly and prevents consecutive holds.
